snippet: SCHMALL--Charles. The Officers, Board of Governors, The Women's Group, Members and Staff of The Muttontown Club mourn the passing of our beloved member, Charles Schmall and extend our sincerest condolences to their children, Richard, RJ, Christopher, Barbara, Lori, Stefanie and their families. Robert Sherman, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHMALL--Charles. The Officers, Board of Governors, The Women's Group, Members and Staff of The Muttontown Club mourn the passing of our beloved member, Charles Schmall and extend our sincerest condolences to their children, Richard, RJ, Christopher, Barbara, Lori, Stefanie and their families. Robert Sherman, President 1/3
